fields.name: AccountKey
fields.description: This property is mutually exclusive with both sasKey and identity; exactly one must be specified.

fields.name: BlobfuseOptions
fields.description: These are 'net use' options in Windows and 'mount' options in Linux.

fields.name: IdentityReference
fields.description: This property is mutually exclusive with both accountKey and sasKey; exactly one must be specified.

fields.name: RelativeMountPath
fields.description: All file systems are mounted relative to the Batch mounts directory, accessible via the AZ_BATCH_NODE_MOUNTS_DIR environment variable.

fields.name: SasKey
fields.description: This property is mutually exclusive with both accountKey and identity; exactly one must be specified.
